content: Design comprehensive configuration system architecture with file hierarchy resolution (project > home > default)
Implement ConfigurationManager class for detecting and loading .mcp directories and files
Create MarkdownParser utility to parse .md files with YAML front matter support
Implement AgentDefinitionLoader for loading agent instructions and behaviors from Markdown files
Implement CommandDefinitionLoader for loading command-specific instructions from commands/ subdirectory
Create HierarchyResolver to handle configuration conflicts and apply proper overrides
Add new CLI commands: 'mcp list agents', 'mcp list commands', 'mcp doctor' with configuration support
Integrate configuration system into existing agent execution flows in agent.ts
Add comprehensive TypeScript type definitions for all configuration structures
Implement comprehensive error handling and validation for configuration files
Add verbose logging support for configuration sources and resolution paths
Create comprehensive test suite and example configuration files
